event.titlec: 「冬日開懷集」系列：七指雜技團《奇幻飛躍旅人》- 工作坊（一）- 深入體驗雜技技巧（加拿大）
event.titlee: 'Cheers!' Series: Passengers - Workshop I - Delve into the intermediate acrobatic movements by The 7 Fingers (Canada)
event.agelimitc: 適合6歲或以上觀眾欣賞。
event.descc: 本工作坊專為希望加深對雜技技巧的瞭解，並提高技術水平的學員而設計，工作坊會測試你的身體協調性和靈活度，學習中高程度的技巧，讓你加深對雜技的認識！參加者應具有基本的相關經驗。
event.desce: Join The 7 Fingers for whom wishes to deepen their knowledge and technical level in the acrobatic discipline! The artists will test your body coordination and flexibility, and you will learn intermediate-advanced level skills to enhance your knowledge of acrobatic arts! Participants should have basic relevant experience.
event.remarkc:
適合曾學習舞蹈或體操人士參與，請穿輕便衣服及襪子。
英語主講，粵語傳譯。
event.remarke:
People with dance or gymnastics background are recommended. Please dress casually and wear socks.
In English with Cantonese interpretation
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「冬日開懷集」系列：七指雜技團《奇幻飛躍旅人》- 工作坊（二）- 跳進雜技的世界（加拿大）
event.titlee: 'Cheers!' Series: Passengers - Workshop II - Dive into the world of acrobatics by The 7 Fingers (Canada)
event.agelimitc: 適合6歲或以上觀眾欣賞。
event.descc: 七指雜技團的團員會帶領參加者初探雜技的世界，引導你接觸不同雜技的基礎知識，活學活用，小試身手！這個工作坊秉承了七指雜技團的精神，盡顯活力、人情味、合作和藝術感！
event.desce: The artists will guide you in exploring the basic knowledge of various acrobatic disciplines, allowing you to apply what you learn in practice! The workshop embodies the spirit of The 7 Fingers: full of energy, humanity, collaboration, and artistry.
event.remarkc:
毋須經驗，請穿輕便衣服及襪子。
英語主講，粵語傳譯。
event.remarke:
No experience required. Please dress casually and wear socks.
In English with Cantonese interpretation
event.presenterorgc: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

event.titlec: 「冬日開懷集」系列：七指雜技團《奇幻飛躍旅人》（加拿大）
event.progtimec: 每場演出長約1小時30分鐘，不設中場休息，遲到者須待適當時候方可進場。
event.progtimee: The running time of the performance is approximately 1 hour 30 minutes without intermission. Latecomers will only be admitted at a suitable break.
event.agelimitc: 適合6歲或以上觀眾欣賞。
event.descc: 故事以火車旅程為背景，透過連串情節帶出車箱內一群陌生乘客命運的相遇，他們有一個共同點：大家都有一個目的地。每名旅客運用奔放的形體動作表達各自的夢想，當中的綢吊、空中飛人、走鋼索、雜耍、呼啦圈等展現表演者的形體藝術和美感。本作品結合舞蹈、戲劇、雜技、音樂、投影等元素，頌揚人際間的平衡與微妙。將鐵路與人生經驗交織在一起，從告別、新開始到回憶的轉換站。
event.desce: The production takes train travel as the story background, a series of vignettes tells the unique stories of fateful encounters inside the cabin, a community of strangers with one thing in common: they all have somewhere to go. Passengers on this train express their dreams through the exuberance of their bodies. The astounding skills like the silks, flying trapeze, tightrope walking, juggling and hula hoops demonstrate the physical artistry and beauty of the performers. Passengers seamlessly combines dance, theatre, acrobatics, music and projections, celebrating the balance and the beauty of interpersonal relationships. Intertwining the railroad and human experience where we transition from farewells, new beginnings to reminiscences.
event.remarkc:
本節目內容不反映康樂及文化事務署的意見。主辦機構有權更改節目及更換表演者。
雜技表演者經長時間及專人訓練，觀眾請勿模仿。

event.titlec: 「冬日開懷集」系列：比爾森阿爾法劇團《劍俠梭羅Z》(捷克)
event.titlee: ‘Cheers!’ Series: Zorro by ALFA Theatre Pilsen (Czech Republic)
event.progtimec: 演出全長約1小時，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The running time is approximately 1 hour without intermission.
event.agelimitc: 適合6歲或以上觀眾欣賞。
event.descc: 《劍俠梭羅Z》是集合冒險、正義和喜劇元素的偶戲。捷克戲偶師以靈活的操偶技藝控制精巧細緻的木偶，配合樂師現場演奏馬利亞奇風格的音樂（墨西哥街頭音樂) ，把劍俠梭羅的傳奇故事生動地呈現在觀眾眼前。
event.desce: Zorro is a puppet show that combines the elements of adventure, justice and comedy. The Czech puppeteers can exquisitely control the puppets with ingenious dexterity with the live mariachi music band (Mexican folk music) to bring the extraordinary legend of Zorro to audience vividly.

event.titlec: 《艱難歲月》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "ADifficult Year"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 阿爾拔和般奴都是購物狂，而且負債累累，他們終日都是靠呃呃騙騙，要不就是無所事事地過活。為了自力更新，他們一起去做一些社區工作。在一次工作中，他們遇到一群年輕的激進份子，這些年輕人為捍衞氣候變化、社會正義和生態責任而不遺餘力…
event.desce: Albert and Bruno are compulsive consumers, over-indebted, they live between small schemes for one and a personal life adrift for the other. It’s in the community work they’re both doing to pull themselves up by their bootstraps that they come across a group of young activists who are revolted by climate change, social justice and eco-responsibility…
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《皮埃爾神父》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "AbbéPierre – A Century of Devotion"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 亨利自出生以來便是一名天主教徒，他決心成為一名神父。第二次世界大戰開始，他卻做出了不同的決定：他加入了法國抵抗運動組織。在戰場上失去了一位朋友，面對戰爭的恐怖，亨利以一個新的身份出現：皮埃爾神父。從二戰結束到2007 年去世，皮埃爾神父以不同的身分面對不同的戰爭。他為無家可歸者進行許多鬥爭，並為失語者發聲。他的事蹟家傳戶曉，成為一個法國傳奇。
event.desce: Born and raised a catholic, Henri Grouès is determined to become a priest. WWII begins and decides otherwise: he joins the Resistance. Losing a friend on the battlefield, facing the horrors of war, Henri Grouès emerges as a new man: L’Abbé Pierre. L’Abbé Pierre will fight for the homeless and give a voice to the speechless. A humanist, he met everyone in needs. His dedication earned him the respect of his peers and a place in every hearts. His impact earned him a place in History.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlee: "Don'tLook Now: We're Being Shot At"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 1941 年夏天，在納粹佔領的法國上空，一架皇 家空軍 B17 飛行堡壘在執行任務後迷失方向， 並在巴黎上空被德國高射砲擊落。機組人員從城市上空跳傘，在那裡他們遇到了房屋油漆工 布維和巴黎國家歌劇院愛發牢騷的指揮萊福 特，並被他們藏了起來。萊福特和布維在抵抗 運動戰士和同情者的協助下幫助幾名機組人員逃往自由區，期間無意中捲入了追捕這幾名飛行員的搜捕行動中。
event.desce: Summer 1941. Over Nazi-occupied France, a Royal Air Force B17 Flying Fortress becomes lost after a mission and is shot down over Paris by German flak. The crew parachutes out over the city, where they run into and are hidden by a house painter and the grumbling conductor of the Opéra National de Paris. Involuntarily, they get themselves tangled up in the manhunt against the aviators as they help the airmen to escape to the free zone with the help of Resistance fighters and sympathisers.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《伊拉哈的處境》─ 德國電影精選：年輕世代
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 庫爾德裔少女伊拉哈自小在德國長大，但生活圈子總圍繞家人與同胞。她打算與任職的洗衣店東主的弟弟結婚，而族人保守的觀念規定妻子出嫁前必須是處子之身，令早已有性經驗的伊拉哈感為難。而當未來夫家要求她去醫院驗明正身，更迫使她四出找尋方法重塑處女膜，但同時也讓她反思文化身份與個人自由之間的衝突。本片細緻入微的劇本並沒有妖魔化傳統價值，反而從描寫家庭和社群對伊拉哈的重要性，突顯主角所陷的兩難局面。主角絲絲入扣的真摯演出，為她贏得 New Faces Awards 的最佳女演員獎。
event.desce: A naked young woman is standing in front of a running washing machine. Flashback. 22-year-old Elaha tries all that she can to recover a supposed “innocence” that she has lost through sex. A plastic surgeon is set to help her. But she cannot come up with the money for the costly procedure. While looking for an alternative, she comes across a special product – a capsule of artificial blood. But what at first seems to be a solution to her problem ultimately forces her into self-exploitation.
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 《戀戀山城》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "Jeannedu Barry"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 在法國山區的一處鄉間，一位老人和他僅存的親戚將貪婪的目光投向了毗鄰的一處空置房產。他們需要這裡的泉水來養花，所以聽到繼承它的人要搬進來的消息感到非常沮喪。他們堵住了泉水，整個炎熱的夏天，他們就手旁觀的看著新鄰居試圖從很遠的地方打井來澆灌莊稼。儘管看到他拼命努力正在損害他的健康，也損害了其妻子和女兒的心，但他們卻自私地只想著得到水。
event.desce: In arural French village an old man and his only remaining relative cast theircovetous eyes on an adjoining vacant property. They need its spring water forgrowing their flowers, so are dismayed to hear the man who has inherited it ismoving in. They block up the spring and watch as their new neighbour tries tokeep his crops watered from wells far afield through the hot summer. Thoughthey see his desperate efforts are breaking his health and his wife anddaughter’s hearts they think only of getting the water.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《杜巴利伯爵夫人》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "Jeannedu Barry"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 工人階級的珍妮年輕貌美，對文化和享樂極之 渴慕，因而利用自己的智慧和魅力一步步攀登 社會階梯。她成為了國王路易十五的寵兒，只 不過國王並不知道她是一名妓女，遇到她使路 易十五重拾對生活的興趣。他們瘋狂地墜入愛 河。珍妮不顧一切禮教和規矩搬到凡爾賽宮居 住，而她的到來震驚了整個宮廷…
event.desce: Jeanne, a young working-class woman hungry for culture and pleasure, uses her intelligence and allure to climb the rungs of the social ladder one by one. She becomes the favourite of King Louis XV who, unaware of her status as courtesan, regains through her his appetite for life. They fall madly in love. Against all propriety and etiquette, Jeanne moves to Versailles, where her arrival scandalizes the court...
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《恩怨情天》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "Manonof the Spring"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 《恩怨情天》接續《戀戀山城》悲劇發生十年後 的故事。Jean 的遺孀離開鄉村回到歌劇舞台， 女兒 Manon 也長大了，成為了一位美麗孤獨的牧羊女。Ugolin 種植康乃馨事業有成，他的祖父希望他娶妻延續家族血脈。當 Ugolin 看到 Manon 在山澗沐浴後，便無可救藥地愛上她。 Manon無意中得知 Ugolin 與其祖父封死泉水的真相後，更得知村民也有份隱瞞父親泉水的位置，忿恨阻斷全村水源。
event.desce: After the death of Jean Cadoret, his wife has returned to the life of opera singer and his daughter Manon has grown up and become a gorgeous lonely shepherdess. Ugolin is now a thirty year-old wealthy bachelor planting carnations. His grandfather Cesar Soubeyran presses him to get married to carry the name of their family since he is the last man alive. When Ugolin sees Manon on the fields, he falls in love with her. One day, Manon plots revenge against Ugolin and Cesar and the whole town is in despair.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《一路有媽》─ 德國電影精選：年輕世代
event.titlee: "My Son" - German Film Forum: Generation Z
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 最美的風景，從來就在不遠處。攝影師 Marlene 的兒子 Jason 遇上滑雪意外，Jason 大難不死毫不知驚，更是令 Marlene 憂心忡忡，決意送他到瑞士接受康復治療。母子倆由柏林出發，駛過大半個德國，踏上一段意料之外的旅程。沿路困獸鬥之下，母子倆必須面對埋藏內心多年的瘡疤，在親近與疏離之間互相了解。Lena Stahl 首次執導，細緻刻劃兩代矛盾，成就這部寫實動人的另類公路電影。
event.desce: Her daredevil son Jason's serious accident is a turning point in the life of photographer Marlene. When it becomes clear how severe Jason's injuries are, only a special rehab in Switzerland can help. Marlene decides to drive her son herself all the way from Berlin across Germany. Mother and son struggle for closeness and distance, disappointing their respective expectations and inevitably ending up in old conflicts. Something from the past is making its way to the surface, and it takes up more space with every kilometer they drive.
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 《非戀人絮語》─ 德國電影精選：年輕世代
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 一場一鏡的十四段戲，刻劃出一對三十出頭的男女關係的轉變，拼湊出反浪漫的現代戀人絮語。由第一幕起，這對同居但不婚的男女瀕臨分手，之後決定生孩子，到最後又再決裂，每一個段落聚焦他們家庭、事業的關鍵時刻，以荒誕但幽默的手法揭示社會眾生相，所探討的課題並不局限於兩性關係，還包括對婚姻和社會階級制度的反思。德文片名「Nö」尤其耐人尋味：女方最初斬釘截鐵地對男方分手的建議說不，但到片末卻忍受不了在這段關係所作出的種種妥協，最後決定離開，狠狠丟棄主流價值。影片極具風格的處理和精準的場面調度，為它贏得意大利 Bergamo 電影節銀獎。
event.desce: Dina and Michael are in their early thirties. He is a doctor, she is an actress. They are happy together until Michael thinks about breaking up. She says: NOPE (NÖ). In thirteen episodes, we then accompany our two heroes while they maneuver through life over the years and try to not lose sight of their love. "NÖ" is a film about love, how to find love and our struggles to live with love. It's a film about a generation in their thirties, who have everything, who have tried everything but who often still fail silently. The film exposes hidden states of mind and at the same time shows the important impact they have on our lives.
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 《百萬之一》─ 德國電影精選：年輕世代
event.titlee: "One in a Million" - German Film Forum: Generation Z
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 擁有百萬粉絲的美國運動員 KOL Whitney 和遠在德國的鐵粉 Yara 遙遙相對，在人生路上面對不同挑戰。Whitney 是體操好手，以短片紀錄訓練過程和生活點滴，吸引了大量觀眾，但隨之而來的是學業、訓練以至家庭的壓力。內向的 Yara 仍在尋找未來路向，剛發現自己有同性戀傾向的她，忐忑應否向好友表明心迹。Yara 視 Whitney 為偶像，注視她的一舉一動，也許是投射自己對生活的渴望，而隨著 Whitney 慢慢找尋體操以外的興趣，Yara 也走出自己的舒適區，探索不同的可能性。兩位美少女的生命軌跡在虛擬和現實之間交搭，映照出網絡世代的成長印記。
event.desce: "One in a Million" tells the story of two girls coming of age. As gymnast and YouTuber Whitney Bjerken from the US struggles with setbacks, she turns to music to express her feelings. Yara from Germany is one of her biggest fans and and part of a show-acrobatics team. When she falls in love with a girl for the very first time, she barely finds time for her fan account anymore. A documentary coming-of-age film about success and loneliness, friendship and first love, coming out as queer and having the courage to find your voice.
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 《再見機器人》（暫譯）─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "RobotDreams"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 這部哥雅獎得主導演Pablo Berger 進軍動畫界的首作，改編自兒童書插畫家Sara Varon 的同名漫畫小說，不但先於康城影展進行首映，更摘下「動畫界奧斯卡」安錫動畫影展大獎。主人翁Dog 厭倦了孤單一人的生活，決定購買組裝機械人Robot「做朋友」。一狗一機械人一拍即合，共同走遍紐約市大街小巷，在展開一段段歷險的同時亦與對方共同創造了各種美好的回憶。然而，正當友誼之花盛開之際，Robot 在一次不幸的意外中被困於海灘，兩名知己霎眼間被分隔兩地…… 動畫選用了美國著名長青樂隊Earth, Wind & Fire 的經典名曲《September》為配樂，記載著一段真摯而感人的情誼，情懷媲美《太空奇兵．威E》跟《星聲夢裡人》，無論是成年人還是小朋友都會睇得開心又有所感悟。
event.desce: Based on a graphic novel by Sara Varon, Goya-Award-winning director Pablo Berger’s first venture into animation is a colourful, vibrant and touching buddy drama. To escape solitude, Dog assembles Robot from a build-it-yourself kit. Setting off on a whimsical exploration of New York City, the new best friends develop an inseparable bond as they savour curbside hotdogs and roller-skate through Central Park. However, their friendship is abruptly brought to a halt when an accident leaves Robot stranded on a beach.
event.remarkc: 不設對白
event.remarke: No Dialogue
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《瞬間只得我倆》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 班與羅拉決定乘船環遊世界。在到達南美洲之前，他們繞道前往南極附近的一個荒蕪的小島。在島上探索期間他們遇上風暴，而且他們的船也不見了。遠離人煙，要獨自面對突然而來危險和即將到來的冬天，班與羅拉不單要為求生而竭盡所能奮力而為，他們更要真誠地面對二人之間的關係。
event.desce: Ben and Laura sail around the world. Arriving off the coast of Antarctica, they take a diversion to explore an island. But once there, their boat disappears in a storm. Suddenly alone, exposed to cold, hunger, fear and the raging elements, Ben and Laura will have to go to the limit of their ability to survive – and the truth about their relationship.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《談談天氣》─ 德國電影精選：年輕世代
event.titlee: "Talking About the Weather" - German Film Forum: Generation Z
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 年屆 39 歲的 Clara 研究黑格爾對小資家庭和自由的論述，還差一年才可拿到博士學位。Clara 的生命看似解放：跟一眾室友同住柏林的潮人區，與離異的丈夫共育女兒，暗交一名男學生，但同時對他保持距離。當她回到母親在鄉郊小鎮的老家為她慶生，發現與母親和舊朋友的日常對話變得瑣碎乏味，令 Clara 猛然意識到自己現在與過去的鴻溝已變得巨大，但更令她困惑的是，她是否比母親和舊友更快樂？本片以含蓄的手法和睿智對白，探討獨立女性面對的社會期望，和人生路上的抉擇和取捨。本片曾於柏林電影節首映，並獲德國影評人大獎最佳劇本獎。
event.desce: Clara is taking a PhD in philosophy. Between her professional ambitions and an affair with one of her students she had little time for family. When Clara visits her home in provincial Mecklenburg-Vorpommern for her mother’s birthday, she finds herself struggling with the pride and expectations but also with the rejection of her family and former companions. She begins to realise just how far she has moved away from her roots in her search for a self-determined life and the price she must pay for it.
event.remarkc: 德語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In German with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 歌德學院主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Goethe-Institut Hongkong

event.titlec: 《的士速逮》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 丹尼爾過去是披薩送貨員。現在他是一名的士司機。他駕駛術高超，駕駛著一輛馬力強大的 汽車。他因為與剛剛考完第八次車牌但失敗的警察艾米連發生衝突而被迫與警方達成交易。如果丹尼爾想保住自己的執照，他就必須幫助搗破一夥搶劫市內多間銀行，然後以高速駕駛成功逃跑的德國銀行劫匪。
event.desce: Daniel used to deliver pizzas. Now he’s a taxi driver. He’s a demon at the wheel and drives a very powerful car. He is forced into making a deal with the police when he has a run-in with Emilien, a cop who’s just failed his driving test for the eighth time. If Daniel wants to hold on to his license, he has to help break up a gang of fast-driving German bank robbers who are plundering the city’s banks.ves Robot stranded on a beach.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《法老、野人與公主》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "TheBlack Pharaoh, the Savage and the Princes"- The 52nd Hong Kong French FilmFestival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 三個故事，三個時代，三個世界。 在古埃及時期，一位年輕的國王成為第一位配得上與他所愛之人執手偕老的黑人法老。在法國中世紀時代，一個神秘的野男孩專門劫富濟貧。在十八世紀的土耳其，糕點王子和玫瑰公主逃離皇宮，去過二人所愛的生活。
event.desce: Threetales, three ages, three worlds. At the time of Ancient Egypt, a young kingbecomes the first black pharaoh to deserve the hand of his loved one. Duringthe French Middle Ages, a mysterious wild boy steals from the rich to give tothe poor. In the 18th century Turkey, a prince of pastries and a princess ofroses escape the palace to live their love.
event.remarkc: 法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 《三劍客之達太安》─ 第52屆香港法國電影節
event.titlee: "TheThree Musketeers: D'artagnan"- The 52nd Hong Kong French Film Festival
event.agelimite: For person aged 6 or above only
event.descc: 劍客達太安為了拯救一名被綁架的年輕女子而受重傷，之後更被棄之不理，讓他自生自滅。當回到巴黎後，他千方百計要找到襲擊他的人。只是他並未意識到這追兇的過程會將他捲進一場真正的戰爭中，而法國的未來亦會因這場戰爭而岌岌可危。達太安與另外三名國王的劍客，性格沖動魯莽的阿多斯、波爾多斯和阿拉米斯聯手，對抗紅衣主教黎塞留的陰謀……
event.desce: D’Artagnanis left for dead after trying to save a young woman from being kidnapped. Whenhe arrives in Paris, he tries by all means to find his attackers. He is unawarethat his quest will lead him at the heart of a real war where the future ofFrance is at stake. Allied with Athos, Porthos and Aramis, three musketeers ofthe King with a dangerous temerity, D’Artagnan faces the dark machinations ofthe Cardinal of Richelieu…
event.remarkc: 英法語對白，英文字幕
event.remarke: In French and in English with English subtitles
event.presenterorgc: 香港法國文化協會主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Alliance Française de Hong Kong

event.titlec: 「大會堂樂萃」系列：「聲影墨色」──萬幸古箏演奏會
event.titlee: “City Hall Virtuosi” Series: Guzheng Recital by Wan Xing
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時30分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes including a 15-minute intermission.
event.descc: 節目包括《出水蓮》、《雪落茫茫》、《蒼歌引》等樂曲，亦有由萬幸創作的箏與豎琴合奏的首演，以及與電子音樂合演的主題作品《聲影墨色》。
event.desce: Programme includes The Lotus Rising from the Water, La Blancheur, Blue Heaven Overture and many more. There will also be a new composition for Zheng and Harp by Wan Xing as well as the thematic Soundscape.
event.remarkc:
「大會堂樂萃」及「音樂顯才華」系列套票優惠 同時購買「『曉月·菱華』—許菱子、吳曉紅古箏演奏會」、「『聲影墨色』—萬幸古箏演奏會」、「譚縉謙鋼琴演奏會」、「程家慧色士風演奏會」及「馬詩恩揚琴演奏會」不同節目的正價門票，可獲以下優惠： 2 場 9 折；3 場 85 折；4 場或以上 8 折。
「大會堂樂萃」及「音樂顯才華」系列集體購票優惠 每次購買「『曉月·菱華』—許菱子、吳曉紅古箏演奏會」、「『聲影墨色』—萬幸古箏演奏會」、「譚縉謙鋼琴演奏會」、「程家慧色士風演奏會」及「馬詩恩揚琴演奏會」的正價門票，可獲以下優惠： 4 至 9 張 9 折；10 至 19 張 85 折；20 張或以上 8 折。
上述購票優惠只可享用其一。
event.remarke:
“City Hall Virtuosi” and “Our Music Talents” Series Package Discount For each purchase of standard tickets for the ‘Guzheng Recital by Xu Lingzi and Ng Hiu-hung’, ‘Guzheng Recital by Wan Xing’, ‘Piano Recital by Charles Tam’, ‘Saxophone Recital by Chemie Ching’ and ‘Yangqin Recital by Yanki Ma’, the following concession applies: 10% off for any 2 programmes, 15% off for any 3 programmes, 20% off for any 4 or more programmes.
“City Hall Virtuosi” and “Our Music Talents” Series Group Booking Discount For each purchase of standard tickets for the ‘Guzheng Recital by Xu Lingzi and Ng Hiu-hung’, ‘Guzheng Recital by Wan Xing’, ‘Piano Recital by Charles Tam’, ‘Saxophone Recital by Chemie Ching’ and ‘Yangqin Recital by Yanki Ma’, the following concession applies: 10% off for 4-9 tickets, 15% off for 10-19 tickets, 20% off for 20 or more tickets.
Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount offers.

event.titlec: 「譚盾WE – 音樂節」：《譚盾：巴赫搖滾與杭蓋 – 當巴赫遇見成吉思汗》
event.titlee: “Tan Dun WE-Festival”: Tan Dun: BACH Rock & Hanggai - When BACH meets GENGHIS KHAN
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時45分，包括中場休息15分鐘。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 45 minutes including a 15-minute intermission.
event.descc: 譚盾聯同著名原生態搖滾樂隊杭蓋和長沙交響樂團，以「古典音樂之父」巴赫的作品為媒介，與原始粗狂的搖滾音樂進行對話，配合數碼動畫和多媒體技術，連接東方與西方、過去與未來、科技與自然生態，為觀眾帶來非一般的聽覺盛宴。當中的曲目如《初升太陽》、《創意曲 – 四季》、《美麗的草原我的家》等將草原山河帶到劇院，帶出保護大自然的信息。此外，唱作歌手譚維維以東方樸素的聲樂傳統風格配以交響樂的形式演繹歌曲。
event.desce: Together with renowned rock band Hanggai and the Changsha Symphony Orchestra, Tan Dun will take the works of Johann Sebastian Bach, dubbed "the father of classical music", as a medium for a dialogue with the Mongolian rock music along with digital animation and multimedia technology.  It will give audiences an exceptional auditory feast that connects East and West, past and future, as well as technology and nature ecology. The music pieces such as "The Rising Sun", " Invention - Four Seasons" and "Grassland My Beautiful Home" possesses an embodied connection to the landscapes of grassland, mountain and river that will deliver the message of protecting nature to the theatre-goers.  In addition, singer-songwriter Tan Weiwei will perform the work in a symphonic setting with rustic traditional oriental vocal style.
event.remarkc:
「譚盾WE–音樂節」套票優惠* 同時購買兩場節目的正價門票，可獲8折優惠。
「譚盾WE–音樂節」集體購票優惠* 每次購買「譚盾WE–音樂節」節目的正價門票，可獲以下優惠： 4 至 9 張 9 折；10 至 19 張85 折；20 張或以上8 折。
*「譚盾WE–音樂節」節目包括《譚盾：巴赫搖滾與杭蓋 – 當巴赫遇見成吉思汗》及《歌劇與舞劇》 上述購票優惠只可享用其一。
event.remarke:
"Tan Dun WE-Festival" Package Discount* 20% off for each purchase of standard tickets of both programmes.
"Tan Dun WE-Festival" Group Booking Discount* For each purchase of standard tickets for the programmes of “Tan Dun WE-Festival”, the following concession applies: 10% off for 4 – 9 tickets, 15% off for 10 – 19 tickets, 20% off for 20 or more tickets.
*"Tan Dun WE-Festival" include Tan Dun: BACH Rock & Hanggai - When BACH meets GENGHIS KHAN and "Opera and Dance Theatre" Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount offers.

event.titlec: 巴赫劇場《聖約翰受難曲》︰演前講座
event.titlee: Bach im Theater: "St. John Passion": Pre-performance Talk
event.descc: 《聖約翰受難曲》是古典音樂中的一座大山，聲蜚合唱節總監趙伯承為今次演出作出多個改動，當中包括聖經故事中門徒彼得和羅馬總督彼拉多的角色、合唱團在演唱中的定位、不同角色的聲部分配等。這些改動看似大膽，卻是基於趙伯承對巴赫深入研究多年的結果，一切皆非無跡可尋。他將分享今次改編的思考歷程和背後的意義，為觀眾入場前做好準備。
event.desce: Bach’s "St. John Passion" is a canonical work in the musical repertoire. SingFest director Patrick Chiu has made some significant adjustments in this production, such as accentuating the roles of Peter, Pontius Pilate and the chorus, as well as transposing vocal types. These changes may look unconventional and daring, but they result from years of research on the composer. Chiu shares his reasoning behind his ideas.

event.titlec: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 浪漫間奏
event.titlee: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - A Romantic Interlude
event.progtimec: 演出長約100分鐘，設一節中場休息。
event.progtimee: The programme will run for about 100 minutes with one intermission.
event.descc: 音樂會將為你獻上一夜感情豐沛及張力澎湃的浪漫時期室內樂作品。充滿默契的鋼琴二重奏魏斯（Orion Weiss）及瓦斯奈（ Shai Wosner）先以舒伯特幻想曲揭開序幕。接着，英藉韓裔小提琴家金沼沃（ So-Ock Kim）及屢獲殊榮的大提琴家加里・霍夫曼（Gary Hoffman）將與鋼琴家魏斯聯手，演奏史密塔納的鋼琴三重奏，旋律優美、抒情細膩。下半場，小提琴巨星寧峰 將率領一眾音樂節藝術家，共同演繹布拉姆斯壯麗的弦樂五重奏，把音樂會推向情感巔峯。
event.desce: Indulge yourself in the profound emotion and expressiveness of chamber music from the Romantic period. The concert begins with the enchanting Schubert Fantasie, performed by the dynamic piano duo Orion Weiss and Shai Wosner. This is followed by the captivating melodies of the Smetana Trio, featuring the dazzling violinist So-Ock Kim, cello powerhouse Gary Hoffman and the brilliant Orion Weiss. The concert reaches its emotional pinnacle with the resplendent beauty of Brahms’ String Quintet, skillfully interpreted by the virtuosic ensemble led by star violinist Ning Feng.
event.remarkc:

event.titlec: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 音樂節閉幕︰崔特許勒聲樂之夜
event.titlee: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - Festival Closing Gala︰A Night with Robin Tritschler
event.progtimec: 演出長約115分鐘，設一節中場休息。
event.progtimee: The programme will run for about 115 minutes with one intermission.
event.descc:
崔特許勒證明了自己在演繹藝術歌曲中的天賦。他的歌聲如春天一般，清新悅耳。」 《留聲機雜誌》
繼2020年音樂節備受讚譽的精湛演出後，愛爾蘭籍男高音崔特許勒（Robin Tritschler）再度回歸比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節。被《每日電訊報》譽為「最為敏鋭及最為音樂性的年輕藝術歌曲詮譯之一」的崔特許勒是次將帶來兩套聯篇歌曲作品——與鋼琴家瓦斯奈（ Shai Wosner ）合作演奏的舒曼《聯篇歌曲》，以及與米羅四重奏 （Miró Quartet） 及瓦斯奈同奏的佛漢威廉斯《溫洛克之崖》。兩首聲樂歌曲作品鮮有演出，卻各具韻味，實不容錯過。
除了聲樂作品外，音樂會亦會帶來改編自貝多芬《大賦格》的四手聯彈作品。最後，多位音樂節藝術家將再聚台上，為觀眾呈獻室內樂作品中最備受愛戴的舒曼鋼琴五重奏，為音樂節劃上完美句號。
event.desce:
"Tritschler confirms his credentials as a natural in Lieder. His is a voice of spring, fresh and easy on the ear” Gramophone
“One of the most sensitive and musical of today’s younger Lieder interpreters” (The Telegraph) Robin Tritschler returns for our Festival Closing Gala. The acclaimed Irish tenor will be performing two song cycles – first he partners with Shai Wosner in one of Schumann’s greatest vocal works Liederkreis; later the pair is joined by the Miró Quartet for the lesser-performed but equally remarkable On Wenlock Edge by Vaughan-Williams.
In additional to these vocal masterpieces, the concert also showcases the dynamic duo of Orion Weiss and Shai Wosner in Beethoven’s Grosse Fuge. And, for the grand finale of this year’s Beare’s Premiere Music Festival, our exceptional festival musicians come together for one of the most beloved works in the chamber music canon, Schumann’s exuberant Piano Quintet.

event.titlec: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 音樂節揭幕︰米羅弦樂四重奏
event.titlee: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - Festival Opening Concert︰Spotlight on the Miró Quartet
event.progtimec: 演出長約105分鐘，設一節中場休息。
event.progtimee: The programme will run for about 105 minutes with one intermission.
event.descc:
「米羅四重奏弓下的《微小説》實為歡樂，當中有既莊嚴又輝煌的和弦，亦有甜美的旋律，以及甚有嘲諷意味的悲哀感。」 《波士頓音樂情報》
本屆音樂節由美國最受備受讚譽的弦樂四重奏之一──米羅四重奏（Miró Quartet）掀起序幕，帶來明星作曲家卡洛琳．蕭（Caroline Shaw）新作《微小説》的亞洲首演。美國作曲家卡洛琳．蕭筆下作品別樹一格，曾獲普立玆音樂大獎及格林美獎等殊榮。是次的作品《微小説》為米羅四重奏所寫，乃飛躍演奏香港、美國拉荷亞音樂協會、卡內基音樂廳、美國侯斯頓室內樂及施賴弗廳音樂會系列在Interlude.hk的支持下共同委約。《微小説》以藝術家喬安．米羅（Joan Miró ）的超現實主義為基礎，娓娓道來六個音樂短故事。
這場音樂會亦會呈獻兩首經典室內樂作品：莫扎特的G小調弦樂五重奏（與中提琴家羅斯塔德 Masumi Per Rostad 合作演出），以及布拉姆斯的第一弦樂四重奏。
event.desce:
The Miró dispatched [Shaw’s Microfictions] joyfully, leaning into the solemnity of the glorious chords, the pleasure of melodic expressions of sweetness and tongue-in-cheek sorrow.” The Boston Musical Intelligencer
Our festival opens with a focus on the Miró Quartet, one of America’s most celebrated and dedicated string quartets, playing the Asian Premiere of star composer Caroline Shaw’s Microfictions. Caroline Shaw is a distinctive voice in American music, and has received a Pulitzer Prize in Music and several Grammy awards. This work, Microfictions, was co-commissioned by Premiere Performances (with the support of Interlude.hk), together with the La Jolla Music Society, Carnegie Hall, Chamber Music Houston and the Shriver Hall Concert Series, and was dedicated to the Miró Quartet themselves. The work is a stimulating set of six short musical stories in the tradition of imagist poetry and the surrealist painting of Joan Miró.
This concert will also feature two beloved masterpieces for strings: the invigorating Mozart’s String Quintet in G minor (with violist Masumi Per Rostad) and the magnificent Brahms Quartet No. 1.

event.titlec: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 音樂童話: 彼得與狼
event.titlee: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - Musical Fairy Tales: Peter and the Wolf
event.predateC: 2024年1月14日（日）下午2時30分（粵語）、下午4時30分（英語）
event.progtimec: 演出長約60分鐘，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The programme will run for about 60 minutes without intermission.
event.descc:
飛躍演奏香港將於2024 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節中呈獻「音樂童話」系列的「第二彈」！音樂會將再次與「非凡管樂派」合作，載譽重演改編自浦羅歌菲夫的經典交響童話《彼得與狼》—— 一個關於兩位主角、彼得的爺爺，以及一眾動物在森林裏發生的驚險故事！除此之外，音樂會亦將為大家帶來家傳戶曉的寓言故事《三隻小豬》，並由一隊弦樂四重奏奏出一些改編自貝多芬第五交響曲的音樂為故事「配樂」。本場「音樂童話」亦將再一次由著名鋼琴家張郁苓演奏她的新作《給孩童的音樂幻想小故事》（選段），為音樂會揭開序幕，讓大小朋友能深刻體會到音樂生動有趣的一面，從而啓發他們對音樂的興趣和幻想。所有故事將由演員張國穎擔任旁白，萬勿錯過！
演出語言 2:30pm為粵語演出 4:30pm為英語演出
event.desce:
Premiere Performances is proud to present the second instalment of Musical Fairy Tales as part of the 2024 Beare’s Premiere Music Festival! The centrepiece will be Prokofiev’s family classic Peter & the Wolf – a fascinating story about the two title characters and a crowd of animals – performed by our wind quintet Viva! Pipers. The concert will also feature The Three Little Pigs (in a clever arrangement of Beethoven’s 5th Symphony for a string quartet) as well as selections from Evelyn Chang’s Fantasies for Children Musical Stories (played by the composer herself). All fairytales will be narrated by actress Margaret Cheung. This concert is a great way for children to experience the descriptive ability of music and to spark their imaginations!
Language 2:30pm performance: With narration in Cantonese 4:30pm performance: With narration in English

event.titlec: 比爾斯飛躍演奏音樂節2024 - 莫扎特之夜
event.titlee: Beare’s Premiere Music Festival 2024 - The Genius of Mozart
event.progtimec: 演出長約110分鐘，設一節中場休息。
event.progtimee: The programme will run for about 110 minutes with one intermission.
event.descc:
寧峰實乃一位出色的演奏家，音色既豐厚亦輕鬆柔和，更藴含着一份真摯感情。」 《華盛頓時報》
傳奇指揮家貝恩曾指莫扎特乃「世間所有音樂天才中最為偉大」。我們誠邀你與多位蜚聲國際的演奏家一起進入莫扎特清新優雅的室內樂世界。首先，鋼琴家魏斯（Orion Weiss）及瓦斯奈（Shai Wosner） 聯手呈獻D大調雙鋼琴奏鳴曲；享負盛名的美國米羅弦樂四重奏（Miró Quartet）帶來「不和諧音」四重奏， 讓你在精彩的和弦間偶尋驚喜。下半場，技藝非凡的小提琴家寧峰夥拍中提琴家羅斯塔德（ Masumi Per Rostad） 及大提琴家加里・霍夫曼（ Gary Hoffman）帶來莫扎特的弦樂三重奏「嬉遊曲」，以既抒情又迷人的弦樂之聲為音樂會劃上句號。
event.desce:
[Ning Feng is] a wonderful player with a creamy, easy tone and an emotional honesty” The Washington Post
Legendary conductor Karl Böhm once described Mozart as the “greatest of all musical geniuses”. Now, you have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the brilliance and grace of Mozart with some of his chamber music masterpieces. Feel the joy and synchronicity between Orion Weiss and Shai Wosner as they perform the rousing Sonata for Two Pianos. Experience the luscious harmonies and stunning artistry of the renowned Miró Quartet as they play the “Dissonance” String Quartet. And to close the concert, violin virtuoso Ning Feng join hands with violist Masumi Per Rostad and cellist Gary Hoffman in the charming “Divertimento” string trio.
event.remarkc:
集體購票優惠 每次購買10張或以上正價門票可享九折優惠。
音樂節折扣優惠 購買四場香港大會堂音樂廳音樂會門票可獲八折優惠（不適用於「音樂童話：彼得與狼」）
上述購票優惠只可享用其一。

event.titlec: 喝采系列：趙成珍鋼琴演奏會
event.titlee: Encore Series: Piano Recital by Seong-Jin Cho
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時30分鐘，包括中場休息15分鍾。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes including a 15-minute intermission.
event.descc:
海頓 E小調鋼琴奏鳴曲，Hob. XVI:34
拉威爾 以海頓為名的小步舞曲 鏡
莫扎特 B小調慢板，K. 540
李斯特 三首彼特拉克十四行詩，S. 161，第四至六首 但丁讀後感—仿奏鳴曲的幻想曲，S. 161，第七首
event.desce:
Haydn Piano Sonata in E minor, Hob. XVI:34
Ravel Menuet sur le nom d’Haydn Miroirs
Mozart Adagio in B minor, K. 540
Liszt 3 Sonnets del Petrarca, S. 161, Nos. 4-6 Après une lecture du Dante, fantasia quasi sonata, S. 161, No. 7
event.remarkc:
集體購票優惠 每次購買正價門票4 至 9 張可獲 9 折；10 至 19 張可獲 85 折；20 張或以上可獲 8 折。
上述購票優惠只可享用其一。
本節目內容不反映康樂及文化事務署的意見。主辦機構有權更改節目。
event.remarke:
Group Booking Discount 10% off for each purchase of 4 – 9 standard tickets, 15% off for 10 – 19 standard tickets, 20% off for 20 or more standard tickets.
Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount offers.

event.titlec: 香港流行文化節2023《傾X文化》
event.titlee: Hong Kong Pop Culture Festival 2023 – Culture Café
event.predateE: 20 May, 17 June, 22 July, 26 August, 23 September, 21 October, 25 November, 16 December 2023
event.progtimee: The sharing session will run for about 1 hour
event.descc: 資深音樂文化人黃志淙及張景謙將圍繞五個主題，從多角度探索香港流行音樂文化的不同面向和轉變。分享會期間將會以黑膠唱盤機播放精選樂曲，讓參與者感受不同年代的音樂細節和韻味。部份分享會亦將邀請不同年代及風格的音樂人擔任嘉賓講者作交流分享。
event.desce: Hosted by veteran music culturists Wong Chi-chung and Clarence Chang , the sharing sessions will focus on five topics, exploring different aspects and changes of Hong Kong's pop music culture from multiple perspectives. Selected music demos will be played through vinyl turntable, letting the participants appreciate the details and tunes of music from different periods, and evoke different memories through the great classics. Musicians from different generations and styles will be invited to join some of the sessions.
event.remarkc:
地點：牧羊少年與他的浮萍
每位參加者購買一杯飲品後即可入場參與，座位有限，先到先得。

event.titlec: 伊莉安．伊莉雅斯爵士音樂會
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時30分鐘，不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The performance will run for approximately 1 hour 30 minutes without intermission.
event.descc: 伊莉安．伊莉雅斯將會帶來她的大熱作品，包括來自專輯《靜謐》(2022) 的歌曲。
event.desce: Eliane Elias will perform her hit compositions, including a selection of works from her album "Quietude" (2022).
event.remarkc:
「音樂盛會」套票優惠 同時購買「伊莉安．伊莉雅斯爵士音樂會」、「鼓童《童》」、「路卡．約臣與雅他．約臣雙鋼琴演奏會」、「Naturally 7 無伴奏合唱音樂會」、「列奧尼達斯．卡華高斯小提琴演奏會」、「中國廣播民族樂團 (24/10)」及「中國廣播民族樂團 (25/10)」不同節目的正價門票，可獲以下優惠： 2場9折；3場85折；4場或以上8折。
「音樂盛會」集體購票優惠 每次購買「伊莉安．伊莉雅斯爵士音樂會」、「鼓童《童》」、「路卡．約臣與雅他．約臣雙鋼琴演奏會」、「Naturally 7 無伴奏合唱音樂會」、「列奧尼達斯．卡華高斯小提琴演奏會」、「中國廣播民族樂團 (24/10)」及「中國廣播民族樂團 (25/10)」的正價門票，可獲以下優惠： 4 至 9 張 9 折；10 至 19 張85 折；20 張或以上8 折。
上述購票優惠只可享用其一。
event.remarke:
"Great Music" Package Discount For each purchase of standard tickets for the ‘Jazz Concert by Eliane Elias’, ‘Warabe by Kodo’, ‘Piano Duo Recital by Lucas & Arthur Jussen’, ‘A Cappella Concert by Naturally 7’, ‘Violin Recital by Leonidas Kavakos’, ‘China Broadcasting Chinese Orchestra (24/10)’ and ‘China Broadcasting Chinese Orchestra (25/10)’ the following concession applies: 10% off for any 2 programmes, 15% off for any 3 programmes, 20% off for any 4 or more programmes.
"Great Music" Group Booking Discount For each purchase of standard tickets for the ‘Jazz Concert by Eliane Elias’, ‘Warabe by Kodo’, ‘Piano Duo Recital by Lucas & Arthur Jussen’, ‘A Cappella Concert by Naturally 7’, ‘Violin Recital by Leonidas Kavakos’, ‘China Broadcasting Chinese Orchestra (24/10)’ and ‘China Broadcasting Chinese Orchestra (25/10)’ the following concession applies: 10% off for 4 – 9 tickets, 15% off for 10 – 19 tickets, 20% off for 20 or more tickets.
Patrons can enjoy only one of the above discount offers.

event.titlec: 2023 樂•誼國際音樂節—合家歡音樂會《馬可孛羅中西樂器遊》
event.titlee: Musicus Fest 2023—Family Concert: Marco Polo's Musical Encounter of East and West
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時20分鐘, 不設中場休息。
event.progtimee: The concert will run for about 1 hour and 20 minutes with no intermission.
event.descc: 有趣劇情配上中西音樂 頂尖音樂家送上互動演出 來自中國和西方的拉弦、彈撥及敲擊樂器等輪流出場，由出色音樂家演奏動聽曲目，音符及節奏和而不同，展開跨文化對話。冒險家馬可孛羅從中國回家，藉著樂器大比拚，向家鄉意大利的親友介紹兩地源遠流長的音樂傳統。 這場合家歡音樂會邀得來自意大利和德國的編導演二人組創作，並由本地演員和多位音樂家合力演出。故事以意大利即興喜劇風格的角色貫穿，輕鬆惹笑，適合一家大小欣賞。 歡迎大家穿上華衣美服，一起參與這場熱鬧的威尼斯面具嘉年華！
event.desce: Getto know Chinese and Western instruments on an interactive journey presented byleading musicians Thegreat adventurer Marco Polo returns to Italy from China, bearing a range ofmusical instruments as gifts from the emperor. He will take audiences to meetthe Venetians Pantalone, Arlecchino and Zazzà, as they prepare for the excitingVenice Carnival and learn about music-playing from talented musicians. Theentrancing tunes in this interactive show showcase Chinese and Westerninstruments and traditions, and the performances are infused with the spirit ofthe classic Italian commedia dell’arte, containing moments of comedy certain todelight kids and adults alike. Dress up, pick a mask and get ready forthis fun-filled Venice Carnival!
event.presenterorgc: 誼樂社
event.presenterorge: Musicus Society

event.titlec: 2023 樂•誼國際音樂節—閉幕音樂會：薩爾斯堡室樂團
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時30分鐘，包括中場休息20分鐘
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes, including a 20-minute intermission.
event.descc: 小提琴獨奏：范曉星及郝立希 薩爾斯堡室樂團 薩爾斯堡室樂團以純正演奏風格著稱，同時透過團員互相聆聽兼容源源不絕的活力，締造「薩爾斯堡之聲」，除了每年參加薩爾斯堡藝術節和莫札特週，亦曾亮相琉森音樂節、BBC逍遙音樂節、愛丁堡國際藝術節、布加勒斯特埃內斯庫音樂節、北京音樂節及紐約卡內基音樂廳等演奏殿堂。 音樂節閉幕演出上，奧地利薩爾斯堡室樂團的木管樂部將演繹拉夫的F大調小交響曲掀起序幕，流暢的音符此起彼落。接著，室樂團在焦點曲目裡呈獻同鄉音樂神童莫札特兩首早期和晚期作品互相輝映：青少年莫札特所寫的C大調雙小提琴協奏曲，由范曉星和郝立希兩位年青音樂家招募優勝者擔任獨奏大放異彩；還有意象恢宏的第四十一交響曲（別號「朱比特」），亦是他最後一首交響曲，堪稱其器樂作品的顛峰之作；最後將獻奏韋納糅合匈牙利舞曲風格的第一嬉遊曲，慶祝音樂節落幕。 節目 拉夫：F大調小交響曲，作品188 莫札特：C大調雙小提琴協奏曲，KV.190 (186e) 莫札特：C大調第41交響曲，K551，《朱比特》 韋納：D大調第1嬉遊曲，作品20
event.desce: ViolinSolo: Fan Hiu-sing & Jeremy Hao Camerata Salzburg Hailingfrom the great composer’s hometown, Camerata Salzburg is the resident orchestraof the city’s annual Mozarteum Festival and has performed in prestigious venuesaround the world, including in the Lucerne Festival, BBC Proms, EdinburghInternational Festival and Carnegie Hall in New York. The purveyors of the “Mozart sound” willgive audiences a special treat at the Festival Finale, presenting Mozart’slesser-performed Concertone for Two Violins and Orchestra in C – featuring FanHiu-sing and Jeremy Hao on violin – and the grand “Jupiter” Symphony as centralpieces. The program also includes Raff’s Sinfonietta for winds and Weiner’sDivertimento No. 1 which incorporates the Hungarian style. Program Raff: Sinfonietta in F, Op. 188 Mozart:Concertone for Two Violins and Orchestra in C, KV190 (186e) Mozart: Symphony No. 41 in C, K. 551,"Jupiter" Weiner: Divertimento No. 1 in D, Op. 20
event.presenterorgc: 誼樂社
event.presenterorge: Musicus Society

event.titlec: 2023 樂•誼國際音樂節—洛蒂與樂．誼獨奏家樂團
event.titlee: Musicus Fest 2023—Louis Lortie and Musicus Soloists Hong Kong
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時30分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes, including a 15 minute intermission.
event.descc: 客席藝術總監及鋼琴獨奏：洛蒂 小提琴獨奏：陳蒨瑩 樂．誼獨奏家樂團 法裔加籍鋼琴家洛蒂的演奏生涯橫跨40年，是布索尼及里茲兩項國際大賽的得獎者，2017至2022年間更曾擔任布魯塞爾伊麗莎白禮拜堂駐場大師，實力毋庸置疑。 洛蒂將會擔任這場音樂會的客席藝術總監，帶領去年初試啼聲、獲稱譽「令人非常滿意……非一般樂團水平」的樂．誼獨奏家樂團，揣摩四位北歐作曲家的19和20世紀曲目：尼爾遜（丹麥）二十來歲（與團員年紀相若時）創作的第一部作品《弦樂小組曲》；帕特（愛沙尼亞）對小提琴獨奏技巧要求甚高、同時運用鐘鳴作曲法追求靈性的《弟兄》；而西貝流士（芬蘭）的兩首弦樂作品亦可互相參照；葛利格鋼琴協奏曲的鏗鏘琴音，則以全弦樂伴奏版本添上新意。 節目 尼爾遜：弦樂小組曲，作品1 帕特：《弟兄》為小提琴、弦樂和敲擊樂而作 西貝流士：給弦樂團的C大調浪漫曲，作品42 西貝流士：給弦樂團的即興曲，作品5 葛利格：A小調鋼琴協奏曲，作品16
event.desce: Guest Artistic Director/ Piano Solo: LouisLortie Violin Solo: Angela Chan Musicus Soloists Hong Kong Award-winningFrench-Canadian pianist Louis Lortie is one of the most versatile artistsworldwide, with a repertoire of astonishing breadth built up over a 40-yearcareer. He was winner of the prestigious Busoni Competition, laureate of theLeeds Competition and Master in Residence at the Queen Elisabeth Music Chapelof Brussels from 2017 to 2022. In this special concert, Lortie guides theensemble to explore works by Nordic composers Carl Nielsen, Arvo Pärt and JeanSibelius, in addition to performing Grieg’s unparalleled Piano Concerto in Aminor in a rarely heard arrangement with all strings accompaniment by MSHK. Program Nielsen: Little Suite for Strings, Op. 1 Pärt: Fratres for Violin, Strings andPercussion Sibelius: Romance in C for String Orchestra,Op. 42 Sibelius: Impromptu for String Orchestra,Op. 5 Grieg: Piano Concerto in A minor, Op. 16
event.presenterorgc: 誼樂社
event.presenterorge: Musicus Society

event.titlec: 2023 樂•誼國際音樂節—新銳音樂家演奏會
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時30分鐘，包括中場休息15分鐘
event.progtimee: The concert will run for about 1 hour and 30 minutes, including a 15 minute intermission.
event.descc: 樂節舉行獨奏會。 「其如歌的音色⋯⋯超炫琴技和詩意想像」 陳倬朗視演奏小提琴為一種獨特的表達方式，藉著在琴弦上創造美妙瞬間，以音樂影響生命。他尤其享受演奏室樂，透過樂音無言溝通的樂趣。 在獨奏會上，他將夥拍蕭邦國際鋼琴大賽得獎者李嘉齡，演繹葛利格糅合挪威民族音樂特色的C小調第三小提琴奏鳴曲、胡拜炫技之作《卡門》華麗幻想曲、貝多芬F大調第五小提琴奏鳴曲「春」及克拉拉．舒曼給小提琴與鋼琴的浪漫曲等，得心應手駕馭不同風格的曲目。 節目 葛利格：C小調第三小提琴奏鳴曲，作品45 胡拜：《卡門》華麗幻想曲 杜布農：《回到蒙福爾拉莫里》 貝多芬：F大調第五小提琴奏鳴曲，作品24，《春》 舒曼：給小提琴與鋼琴的三首浪漫曲，作品22
event.desce:
Violin: Aaron Chan Piano: Colleen Lee “Singing tone…bravura technique and poeticimagination” 2023Young Artist Audition winner and two-time winner of the prestigious SylvaGelber Award, violinist Aaron Chan had also won concerto competitions at theCleveland Institute, McGill and Rice universities. Moreover, he has honed hisskills by taking part in the Verbier Festival’s Soloist and Chamber MusicAcademy in Switzerland. Chan will be accompanied by renowned HongKong pianist and International Chopin Piano Competition prizewinner Colleen Leein romantic period works.
Program Grieg: Violin Sonata No.3 in C minor, Op.45 Hubay: Carmen: Fantaisie brillante Dubugnon: Retour á Montfort l'Amaury Beethoven: Violin Sonata No. 5 in F, Op.24,"Spring" Clara Schumann: Three Romances for Violinand Piano, Op. 22
event.presenterorgc: 誼樂社
event.presenterorge: Musicus Society

event.titlec: 2023 樂•誼國際音樂節—李垂誼與薩爾斯堡室樂團
event.titlee: Musicus Fest 2023—Trey Lee and Camerata Salzburg
event.progtimec: 節目長約1小時40分鐘，包括中場休息20分鐘
event.progtimee: The performance will run for about 1 hour and 40 minutes, including a 20-minute intermission.
event.descc: 大提琴：李垂誼 薩爾斯堡室樂團 闊別香港的薩爾斯堡室樂團以純正演奏風格著稱，同時透過團員互相聆聽兼容源源不絕的活力，是薩爾斯堡藝術節和莫札特週的常客，亦曾亮相琉森音樂節、BBC逍遙音樂節、愛丁堡國際藝術節、布加勒斯特埃內斯庫音樂節、北京音樂節及紐約卡內基音樂廳等演奏殿堂。 誼樂社藝術總監及大提琴家李垂誼，曾獲已故指揮家馬捷爾讚揚為「令人驚嘆的主角……極之出色的大提琴家」，他將為蕭斯達高維契的大調第一大提琴協奏曲擔任獨奏。這首題獻給俄羅斯大提琴大師羅斯卓波維契的協奏曲，淋漓盡致地發揮大提琴本色，公認為蕭氏最成功的作品之一。其他曲目還有孟德爾遜的《赫布里底群島》序曲，穿越波濤洶湧的大西洋神遊芬加爾洞窟，以及貝多芬動人心弦的第七交響曲掀起音樂會高潮。國際一流室樂團和演奏家以精湛演出為中國巡演作結，不容錯過！ 節目 孟德爾遜：《赫布里底群島》序曲，作品26 蕭斯達高維契：降E大調第一大提琴協奏曲，作品107 貝多芬：A大調第七交響曲，作品92
event.desce: Cello: Trey Lee Camerata Salzburg CamerataSalzburg graces Musicus Fest 2023 with Musicus Artistic Director and cellistTrey Lee as soloist to serve up a concert experience not to be missed. Theresident orchestra of Salzburg’s Mozarteum Festival has appeared in prestigiousvenues such as the Lucerne Festival, BBC Proms, Edinburgh InternationalFestival and Carnegie Hall in New York. Trey Lee was praised as “a marvellousprotagonist...a superb cellist” by the late great conductor Lorin Maazel. Inthe hands of Trey and the Camerata, Shostakovich's Cello Concerto No. 1 is atour de force of the rhythmic power and relentless drive of his music. Theexquisite program is complemented by sailing through rolling waves inMendelssohn’s Hebrides Overture and basking in Beethoven’s triumphant SymphonyNo. 7. Program Mendelssohn: The Hebrides Overture,Op. 26 Shostakovich: Cello Concerto No. 1 inE-flat, Op. 107 Beethoven: Symphony No. 7 in A, Op. 92

event.titlec: 新視野藝術節2023延伸活動：「水舞台的奧秘」後台導賞
event.titlee: New Vision Arts Festival 2023 Fringe Activities: "The Secret of Water on Stage" Backstage Tour
event.agelimite: Audiences below 6 will not be admitted
event.descc: 在演出中，香港文化中心大劇院化身宇宙洪荒，讓舞者置身在一片澤國中。參加者將深入後台，一窺帕派約安努舞台幻象的秘密。
event.desce: In the stunning stage performance, the Hong Kong Cultural Centre Grand Theatre becomes an alternate universe flooded with water, a world for dancers to traverse. Participants on this tour learn about the secrets behind Papaioannou's incredible theatrical illusion.

event.titlec: 新視野藝術節2023：迪米特里斯．帕派約安努 (希臘) 《INK》
event.titlee: New Vision Arts Festival 2023: "INK" by Dimitris Papaioannou (Greece)
event.predateC: 2023年11月9至10日(四至五) 下午7時30分; 2023年11月11日 (六) 下午3時
event.agelimite: Audiences below 16 will not be admitted
event.descc:
他的生命與潛意識—— 當代舞幻象大師親身演出最私密之作
享譽全球的編舞大師帕派約安努十年來首度親自參演，台上只有他和他的「分身」。守衛者正努力維持宇宙脆弱的平衡。一個來客闖入，頃刻劃破孤獨。雙人舞變諜對諜，溫柔與殘暴僅一線之差。這會是一場引人入勝的探戈、惡夢連連的狩獵，還是試圖從自己逃脫？
在帕派約安努的視覺魔法下，水連綿不絕地從漆黑的舞台傾瀉，二人在瀲灩澤國無止境地拉扯，靜止和暴烈交錯的舞蹈語言充滿隱喻，在喘息與對峙間互相釋放和束縛，暗示人類原始狀態，讓觀眾屏息靜氣墮入藝術家內心的夢魘。
《INK》為帕派約安努在疫情期間的最新創作，借鑑他心愛的繪畫、宗教、異形、科幻小說、希臘神話和暗黑奇幻，從內心最柔軟之處出發，抵達潛藏的陰暗面，直面矛盾、慾望和恐懼。
這是繼《偉大馴服者》世界巡演後大師再度訪港親身演出。《INK》於2021年榮獲Ubu 獎意大利最佳外國演出。
event.desce:
Being and the subconscious — the most personal work to date of a true master of visual spectacle
Internationally-acclaimed choreographer Dimitris Papaioannou returns to dance on stage after a decade, sharing it with a younger dancer who could be his "double". The guardian of a submerged, flooded universe tries to maintain its order. The intrusion of a visitor from the bowels of the earth disrupts the guardian's solitary balance, introducing tenderness and torment and probing a fine line between the two. Is this a beguiling tango, a gripping chase, or an attempt at escape?
Set on the dark, bare stage, with only an irrigation system visible to the eye, "INK" is Papaioannou's latest creation of magical illusion, the dance-like push-and-pull between the two is filled with metaphor; juxtaposing stillness with violence, they portray a primal repose and stalemate, drawing the audience irresistibly into this nightmare.
"INK" is Papaioannou's newest work dating from the COVID pandemic, distilling emotions and reflections on his life-long interests such as painting, religions, aliens, sci-fi, Greek mythology and dark fantasy. Emanating from his most introspective being, he plumbs the subconscious, coming face to face with conflict, desire and fear.
After the success of the world tour of "The Great Tamer", Papaioannou returns to Hong Kong, even appearing on stage. "INK" received the Ubu Award for best foreign show presented in Italy in 2021.

event.titlec: 新視野藝術節2023：愛知縣藝術劇場(日本) 及舞踊空間橫濱 (日本) 《RAIN》
event.titlee: New Vision Arts Festival 2023: "RAIN" by Aichi Prefectural Art Theater (Japan) and Dance Base Yokohama (Japan)
event.predateC: 2023年11月10至11日(五至六) 下午8時; 2023年11月12日 (日) 下午3時
event.progtimec: 1 小時 20分鐘，不設中場休息
event.agelimite: Audiences below 6 will not be admitted
event.descc:
如果黑雨過後 天永不放晴
地面的黑影，來自天上的烏雲。人類在狹縫中前行，如何超越自身背負的陰影？
改編自20世紀初英國小說家毛姆名著《雨》，一群對立的人被困在同一屋簷下，壓抑凝結成雨，在窒息的低氣壓中掙扎，衝突山雨欲來。編舞家鈴木竜編成回應當下的舞蹈作品。
當代藝術家大卷伸嗣的裝置《臨界之氣 — 重黑》把雨變得沉重具象，將一切吞噬，只餘舞者在黑壓壓的雨絲下糾纏。聲音藝術家 evala 則讓音符串成漫天雨幕，灑進觀眾心坎。黑雨過後，剩下潮濕的陰影。
這次新視野版本的演出中，兩位年輕舞者從新視野與香港演藝學院舞蹈學院合作的選拔脫穎而出，將與日本舞者一起踏上台板。
event.desce:
What if the sky never clears after the storm?
Shadows on the ground are cast by dark clouds in the sky. As people probe their way along a narrow crack, can they surpass the shadows they cast themselves?
Choreographer Ryu Suzuki adapts English writer Somerset Maugham's short story into a dance work that reflects our times. In Maugham's original, people at odds with each other are trapped under one roof waiting for the onslaught of torrential rain, emotionally tangled while suffocating in the limited space.
The literary metaphor of rain turns physical and overwhelming as contemporary artist Shinji Ohmaki brings an adaptation of his installation "Liminal Air – Black Weight" to the stage. What remains are dancers entwined in a sea of suspended black strands. Sound artist evala transforms musical tones into raindrops that touch our hearts. Even after a downpour, shadows linger on.
In the upcoming edition, the Japanese cast is joined by two young dancers selected by audition organised by New Vision Arts Festival and the School of Dance, the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts.

event.titlec: 新視野藝術節2023：阮兆輝、鄧樹榮《老人與他的海》
event.titlee: New Vision Arts Festival 2023: "The Old Man and His Sea" by Yuen Siu-fai and Tang Shu-wing
event.predateC: 2023年11月10至11日(五至六) 下午8時; 2023年11月12日 (日) 下午3時
event.agelimite: Audiences below 6 will not be admitted
event.descc:
阮兆輝從藝70年改編演繹海明威巨著 戲中戲圓梨園夢
女子發現已故外公年輕時想將《老人與海》改編成粵劇，可惜終身無法實現，於是靠想像替外公圓夢……
戲劇大師鄧樹榮在舞台上，為多年好友、粵劇大師阮兆輝實現其潛藏十年、改編諾貝爾文學獎得主海明威名著的意念。阮兆輝為小說創作全新粵劇曲詞，突顯戲曲表演程式的簡約虛擬美學，弘揚中國古典藝術精粹。
演出結合當代戲劇和戲曲，鄧樹榮導演粵劇，梳理東西方戲劇根源，提煉戲曲功架與西方形體，讓故事穿梭時空。藝術不論地域，最終殊途同歸。
event.desce:
Crowning seven decades in Cantonese opera, Yuen Siu-fai adapts Ernest Hemingway's masterpiece as a "play within a play"
A young woman discovers that her grandfather had read "The Old Man and the Sea" when he was young and was inspired to adapt it as Cantonese opera but never completed it. In her reverie, she fulfils his lifelong dream.
Theatre master Tang Shu-wing and Cantonese opera master Yuen Siu-fai are longtime friends. For this production, Tang helps Yuen realise his decade-long wish to adapt Nobel laureate Ernest Hemingway's novel. Apart from playing the title role, Yuen has penned a new libretto attesting to the abstract minimalist aesthetics of the Chinese opera tradition while emphasising the essence of Chinese classical arts.
Tang fuses contemporary theatre and Chinese opera, identifying the roots of theatre both East and West, juxtaposing Chinese opera movements and Western physicality, enabling the story to traverse time and space. No matter where different artistic genres originate, they inevitably meet along the same path.

event.titlec: 新視野藝術節2023延伸活動：「走進黑雨」舞台導賞
event.titlee: New Vision Arts Festival 2023: "Walking into Black Rain" Stage Tour
event.agelimite: Audiences below 6 will not be admitted
event.descc: 視覺藝術家大卷伸嗣以大型裝置於國際藝壇享負盛名。今次他將回應日本311大地震的作品《臨界之氣——重黑》融入《RAIN》的舞台。大卷伸嗣將會親自介紹此裝置，參加者能觸碰作品的懸垂黑色繩索，感受藝術家如何將無形的時間、壓力、重量和空間凝結及具體化。
event.desce: Visual artist Shinji Ohmaki's large-scale installations have won him international acclaim. This time, he incorporates his "Liminal Air — Black Weight", created after the 2011 Great East Japan Earthquake, into the dance work "RAIN". Ohmaki introduces his work in person and participants can touch the installation and its suspended black threads, experience how time, gravity and oppression become tangible and tactile, and a new embodied perceptive space.
event.remarkc: (1) 日語講解，粵語傳譯 (2) 參加者須自備及佩戴口罩以保護裝置
event.remarke: (1) In Japanese, with Cantonese interpretation (2) To protect the installation, participants are required to bring and wear their own masks

event.titlec: 新視野藝術節2023：趙伯承、林俊浩、聲蜚合唱節及柏林魯特文藝復興樂團(德國) 「巴赫劇場《聖約翰受難曲》」
event.titlee: New Vision Arts Festival 2023: Bach im Theater: "St. John Passion" by Patrick Chiu, Ivanhoe Lam, SingFest and lautten compagney BERLIN (Germany)
event.agelimite: Audiences below 6 will not be admitted
event.descc:
一次過重鑄聖經和巴赫兩個經典
結合古典聲樂及當代劇場，合唱藝術家趙伯承及編舞家林俊浩大膽改動巴赫筆下的聲部以至角色定位，合唱團及獨唱家打破慣例以形體舞蹈演出，將耶穌被釘十字架的故事和巴赫傑作賦予嶄新面貌。
來自香港、德國、日本和美國等地，不同膚色和文化背景的歌唱家、演奏家和合唱團，穿上現代社會日常服裝，「扮演」耶穌、門徒彼得、羅馬總督彼拉多及猶太人群眾。在音樂、形體和舞台美學編排下，褪去歷史的外衣，將耶穌及巴赫帶到21世紀：當全球人類因政治經濟科技連在一起，誰能置身事外？如何帶著不可挽回的錯誤活下去？
飾演耶穌的 Reginald Mobley為現今炙手可熱的高男高音，今年獲邀於英國國王加冕典禮及BBC Proms演出。
聲蜚合唱節以現代手法重鑄經典，2022年於巴赫故鄉德國預演，為巴赫音樂節揭幕，獲當地對「國寶」暸如指掌的音樂家及聽眾擊節讚賞。
event.desce:
Upending both the biblical story and Bach's masterpiece
Fusing Baroque music and contemporary theatre, choral artist Patrick Chiu and choreographer Ivanhoe Lam audaciously recast J.S. Bach's voice types and dramatic figures, where choristers and soloists engage in movement and action, bestowing the crucifixion story and Bach's choral masterpiece with an entirely new character.
Performers from Hong Kong, Germany, Japan and the USA hailing from a variety of ethnicities and backgrounds — and dressed in everyday clothes — play the roles of Jesus Christ, Peter, Pontius Pilate and the Jewish people. No matter whether in musical treatment, movement and staging, this production peels off layers of history, catapulting Jesus Christ and Bach into the 21st century: When all humanity is interlinked through politics, economics and technology, can we afford to be a spectator? How can anyone bear to live with irrevocable, fatal mistakes?
In the role of Jesus, Reginald Mobley is one of today's hottest countertenors, having been invited to perform at the coronation ceremony of Charles III and the BBC Proms this year.
Breaking through conventional interpretations of Bach's music, a preview of this production at Thüringen Bachwochen in the composer's home country last year received rave reviews.

event.titlec: 特備節目：進展香港 — 與梁振英先生對談
event.titlee: Special Programme: Evolving Hong Kong – Dialogue with Mr. C.Y. Leung
event.descc:
韓秉華教授將特邀嘉賓梁振英先生對談及與公眾分享多項重要的設計項目及其對社會的意義，分享他的視覺設計理念和對服務社會的熱誠，並會與同樣熱心擔任各種公職的梁振英先生討論香港的社會文化發展與變化，以及國家近年發展的機遇，鼓勵年青人建立愛國愛港及胸懷世界的情懷。
講者︰韓秉華教授 (著名設計師、藝術家) 、梁振英先生 (共享基金會主席、廣州南沙民心港人子弟學校理事會主席)
配合「迁想無界 — 韓秉華藝術與設計展」特備節目
event.desce:
Professor Hon Bing-wah invited Mr. C.Y. Leung for a dialogue to exchange views on several important design projects and their social significance, as well as his visual design concepts and deep commitment to social service. Drawing upon Mr. Leung's extensive experience serving Hong Kong in various official capacities, they will discuss Hong Kong's social and cultural development and changes, and the opportunities that have emerged from the recent national development initiatives, and encourage young people to foster their love and passion for our Country and Hong Kong, as well as the world.
Speakers: Professor Hon Bing-wah (Renowned designer and artist) and Mr. Leung Chun-ying (Chairman of the GX Foundation and Chairman of the School Board of Minxin Hong Kong School (Guangzhou Nansha)
In association with “The Reflection: Art & Design of Hon Bing-wah" Exhibition
event.remarkc: 無須預先報名。劇院將於活動開始前15分鐘開放予觀眾入場，名額有限，先到先得，額滿即止。
event.remarke: No registration needed. Audiences will be admitted 15 minutes before the programme commences. Limited seats on a first-come, first-served basis.

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：普 劇場 合家歡音樂劇《Rudolph聖誕歷險記》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme : "Rudolph Christmas Adventure Musical"  by Pop Theatre
event.descc: 叮叮噹，跟RUDOLPH 一起尋回歡樂的笑聲！ 平安夜，弊傢伙，聖誕老人消失咗！ Rudolph為尋找聖誕老人，沿途發生一連串驚險刺激的尋找旅程，並遇見不同的聖誕人物。 最後Rudolph 能否成功尋回聖誕老人及歡樂的笑聲？呵！呵！呵！
event.desce: Jingle bells, jingle bells Jingle all the way~ Let’s find the laughter with Rudolph!
event.remarkc: 普 劇場為屯門大會堂場地伙伴
event.remarke: POP Theatre is a Venue Partner of the Tuen Mun Town Hall
event.presenterorgc: 普 劇場主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by POP Theatre

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團 音樂劇《星動傳奇》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme : "The Musical Starry Legends" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 滿腔熱誠音樂人Michael受市道及疫情影響，被逼轉型成一名學院代課老師，心灰意冷的他途經禮堂，眼見一班話劇團學生各具音樂、跳舞、話劇天份，但總是為突出自我而爭吵。相反另一校內演唱團隊「Star」異常合拍，更勝出比賽，獲邀參加兩星期後電視台直播的「全民組隊」大賽。 可惜⋯⋯「Star」團員集體中毒，成員不夠半數下將被取消資格。團長「阿樂」發現Michael 是過去傳奇音樂人物，危急下要求他幫忙，並從新組合「Star」參加比賽。 這群少年能否表演成功實現夢想！就要你齊來見証！
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version.
event.remarkc: 春天實驗劇團及生輝粵劇研究中心為屯門大會堂場地伙伴
event.remarke: Spring-Time Experimental Theatre and Glory Chinese Opera Institute are the Venue Partners of the Tuen Mun Town Hall
event.presenterorgc: 春天實驗劇團主辦
event.presenterorge: Presented by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團 音樂劇《緣份》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme :"Destiny - The Musical" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 人與人之相識被視作命中注定的緣份。一個舞台，兩名演員，述說着梅艷芳與張國榮的緣份，同時也述說着彼此的緣份。音樂會結合戲劇及演唱會元素，兩名演員將分享兩位巨星對他們的影響，現場更會演繹接近30首張國榮和梅艷芳的經典金曲，用歌聲懷念他們。
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version.

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團 粵劇《我和春天有個約會》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme :"I Have a Date with Spring"  by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 五十年代，大批美軍過往香港， 香港娛樂服務行業異常繁榮。 年青的姚小蝶為家計所迫， 歷盡曲折加入茶樓歌壇， 結識了蓮茜、鳳萍、露露眾姐妹，成為著名歌伶。 與令她刻骨銘心的家豪， 演繹了一段感肺腑的愛情絕唱。 誰料一次意外導致家豪一去無返，杳無音訊， 令姚小蝶苦等二十年……
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version.

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團 音樂劇《歡樂滿人間》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme :"Jolly World" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 林芳華自幼在孤兒院長大，陰差陽錯之下被富家子弟巫百仁賞識助養，讓其成才。然而彼此年紀只差七歲，並不符合助養條件，於是巫百仁決定以“無名氏”的身份助養，而兩人之間亦只依靠信件聯絡。然而很快，巫百仁便將收養之事拋之腦後，只交給秘書處理。時光飛逝，林芳華因一直都得不到養父的回信，倍感寂寞。在某個音樂演奏會上，巫百仁巧遇林芳華，彼此心存好感，漸生情愫，卻又不知真正身份。與巫家世交的王家女兒貝蒂與百仁青梅竹馬一同長大，正巧也是林芳華的大學同學。一次學校舞會上，表妹發現百仁喜歡芳華，且誤會芳華與同學軒利在一起，於是決定向巫父告密，拆散二人。巫父以經濟封鎖來禁止百仁與芳華交往。一對戀人被迫分隔。學校的畢業匯演中，芳華將自己孤單與思念寄託於表演之中，通過演出打動了同場觀看的百仁父母，而當巫父得知百仁與芳華陰差陽錯的助養關係後，巧妙安排，揭開實情，一對有情人終成眷屬。
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version.

event.presenterorge: Presented by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre

event.titlec: 屯門大會堂場地伙伴計劃：春天實驗劇團 合家歡爆笑動作劇場《貓捉老鼠2024》
event.titlee: Tuen Mun Town Hall Venue Partnership Scheme "Cats and Mouse 2024" by Spring-Time Experimental Theatre
event.pricec: $250, 190, 130 (全日制學生及綜援受惠人士優惠先到先得，額滿即止)
event.pricee: $250, 190, 130 (Consessionary discount for Full-time students and Comprehensive Social Security Assistance (CSSA) recipients on a first-come-first-served basis with limited quotas)
event.descc: 「貓捉老鼠」，一個人盡皆知的經典故事， 內容講述一隻被主人嬌縱的家貓， 與牠的鄰居一隻可愛聰敏的小老鼠之間的生活日常。 家貓有一種強烈的欲望， 總是不斷努力的去捉同居一室的老鼠， 並努力驅趕著這位討厭的房客。 但老鼠足智多謀，總能躲避家貓的抓捕， 儘管總是失敗，但家貓在追逐中得到的樂趣遠遠超過了捉住老鼠。
event.desce: Please refer to Chinese version.
